entry.title: Russian Soldier Recounts Shooting Civilian in Ukraine War-Crimes Trial
entry.content: Vadim Shishimarin, a 21-year-old Russian soldier, told a Kyiv courtroom he opened fire on the man while riding in a commandeered car in northeast Ukraine in late February.

entry.title: Can Ukraine Win? Five Scenarios for the War's Next Phase
entry.content: Russiaâ€™s shift to a scaled-down offensive in the east and southeast looks increasingly difficult for Putin to pull off. Analysts weigh the possibilities of where the conflict goes from here.
